actions.text: Referred to the Subcommittee on Government Management, Organization, and Procurement.

committees.subcommittee: Subcommittee on Government Management, Organization, and Procurement

official_title: To provide for the establishment of Federal fleet refueling centers.

summary.text: Requires federal agencies to install at least one renewable fuel pump at each federal fleet fueling center in the United States by January 1, 2010. Requires the President to report to Congress annually on agency compliance.

titles.title: To provide for the establishment of Federal fleet refueling centers.
